text: Hagi anantera rankarega me'nesnige'za, ana rankankura Ruotage Avu'ava'mofo Rankane hu'za agia ahegahaze. Hanki ana kantera agruma osu'nesnaza vahe'mo'za kana vano osugahaze. Anumzamofo vahe'mo'zage ana kampina vano hugahaze. Ana nehanage'za neginagi zamavu zamava'ma nehaza vahe'mo'za ana kantera vano osugahaze.
